comments:
To reproduce:
1.  From debug perspective, make sure console is opened and is on top.
2.  Shut down and restart workbench.
3.  When workbench is restarted, the console view remains on top.
4.  Try opening a new Java Stack Trace Console. (via drop down from "Open 
Console" action)

Resulted exception:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: No property tester contributes a 
property processTypeTest to type class

(TestExpression.java:54)

(CompositeExpression.java:47)

(EnablementExpression.java:29)
